description: a(n) = number of primes q
comments: Number of distinct prime factors of p_n-2.
example: First prime is 2, p_1-2 = 0 which has no prime factors, 2nd is 3, 3-2 = 1 which also has no prime factors. p_6 is 17 and 15 has 2 distinct prime divisors. a(219) = A001221(Prime(219)-2) = A001221(1365) = A001221(3*5*7*13) = 4
author: _Clark Kimberling_
